WorkItem.Description:
Dear,
 
The annexed application demonstrates that 'TAB' and 'SHIFT-TAB' into a datagrid may cause the following :
 
- rows are shifted vertically
- cell selection is not consistent with behaviour inside the datagrid
 
Thank you,
 
Julie
 
Procedure
------------
Unzip annexed file
Start Visual Studio 2008 and adjust the reference to 'WPFToolkit.dll' (I used v3.5.40128.1) in the solution project
 
Scenario
----------
The scenario is fully illustrated in the annexed Excel file
 
End
WorkItem.Summary: DataGrid : TAB into shifts rows vertically

Comments.Message:
This a bug with the default implementation of ItemsControl's virtualization.  It has been recorded in our internal bug database.

Thanks.
